author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is complementary to #27042 (~~well, at the moment header->source move is included here as well~~) to discuss about migration of SiPixelGenErrorDBObjectESProducer and SiPixelTemplateDBObjectESProducer to EventSetup consumes (as part of #26748).

The challenge in these two classes is the use of magnetic field value to deduce which of 6 possible Template/GenError payloads to actually use. This PR has the straightforward approach, i.e. to define 6 ESGetTokens and then decide in `produce()` which of the 6 possible tokens to use for the `get()`.

But this approach (alone) is not necessarily what we want, as naively it would lead the framework to load all 6 payloads in prefetching (or those that are available in the GlobalTag, ~~by quick look at least the HLT run2 data GT has all 6 payloads, while corresponding RECO GT has only one~~ in case a GT would not have all of them).

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, no changes expected.

@Dr15Jones
title: [RFC] Migrate SiPixelGenErrorDBObjectESProducer and SiPixelTemplateDBObjectESProducer to EventSetup consumes
